import React from 'react' import DateNow from './DateNow' import FormReg from './FormReg' import Modal from './UI/Modal/Modal' const Profile = ({ year, month, day, isLogin, name, secondName, modalReg, setModalReg, modalLogin, setModalLogin }) => { const isLoginBtn = true; return (
{ isLogin === true ? <>

Hello {name} {secondName}

:
}
) } export default Profile
